name: POUR!
description:
You play as a wild west barman, patrons come into your saloon with various orders. You must serve them the correct order before they get too rowdy.

You are situated behind the bar. Patrons appear with an order and you must serve them without a hitch! Take the right bottle and pour it into the right glass, then pass the glass to the patron and get a reward, simple!Some patrons might be asking for drinks they should not be getting due to their age or who they are with. Keep an eye out for those and make sure to serve them milk instead!

Created for our 3rd Year Games Development module at the University of Derby 2020
